thread.title: Slain Ohio officers remembered as heroes at funeral

title: Slain Ohio officers remembered as heroes at funeral
text:
Slain Ohio officers remembered as heroes at funeral Friday, February 16, 2018 - 01:16 
Family, friends, and police officers from around the country gathered to bid a final farewell to two Ohio police officers killed in the line of duty. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Family, friends, and police officers from around the country gathered to bid a final farewell to two Ohio police officers killed in the line of duty. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2EOpAEH
